statements: DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100 AND age < 30;

DELETE FROM user_settings WHERE language = 'English' AND timezone = 'GMT';

DELETE FROM Settings WHERE notifications_enabled = false AND theme = 'light';

DELETE FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 201 AND show_recommendations = false;
DELETE FROM profiles WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
